name: State Property Tax
description:
Property is a limited resource and so there needs to be a cost added to it to use it exclusively. The way that is done here is through a property tax that taxes every 24 hours the amount of tax per claim set by the government of each state. This is done for all states to avoid needing multiple laws for it. 

Default tax rate is zero so no tax will be collected until the state government decides to increase it to a positive value.

properties.Title: Property Tax
properties.UserDescription: Taxes every 24 hours all plots in the 5 states. Taxes go the the treasuries of those states.

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.
